verses.text_uthmani: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَبَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9556'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى بِيَدِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13755'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':81'>َىْءٍ ق</tajweed>َد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tabārakal-lażī biyadihil-mulk(u), wa huwa 'alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
verses.translation: Благословен будь Тот, В Руке Которого вся власть (над миром), Кто всемогущ над всем и вся

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13756'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْتَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13757'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَيَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةَ لِيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3603'>بْ</tajweed>لُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13758'>اً‌ۚ و</tajweed>َهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7045'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13759'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażī khalaqal-mauta wal-ḥayāta liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu 'amalā(n), wa huwal-'azīzul-gafūr(u).
verses.translation: Кто создал смерть и жизнь, Чтоб испытать, Кто праведней из вас в своих деяньях. Велик в могуществе Своем И отдающ во всепрощенье Он

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':158'>بْ</tajweed>عَ سَمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13760'>تٍ ط</tajweed>ِبَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13761'>قًا‌ۖ م</tajweed>َّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13762'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13763'>ن ت</tajweed>َفَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>وُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13764'>تٍ‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13765'>ٱ</tajweed>رْجِعِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13766'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13767'>ن ف</tajweed>ُط<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażī khalaqa sab'a samāwātin ṭibāqā(n), mā tarā fī khalqir-raḥmāni min tafāwut(in), farji'il-baṣara hal tarā min fuṭūr(in).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто создал семь небес рядами. В Божественном творенье том Не различить тебе (структурных) нарушений. И снова обрати свой взор - Ты зришь какой-нибудь изъян (в творенье этом)

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13768'>ٱ</tajweed>رْجِعِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13769'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2282'>نق</tajweed>َلِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2282'>بْ</tajweed> إِلَيْكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13770'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَصَرُ خَاسِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13771'>ئًا و</tajweed>َهُوَ حَس<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡummarji'il-baṣara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal-baṣaru khāsi'aw wa huwa ḥasīr(un).
verses.translation: И вновь свой взор ты обрати: Вернется он униженным и тщетным

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> زَيَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11314'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11315'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دُّنْيَا بِمَصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا رُجُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13772'>مًا ل</tajweed>ِّلشَّيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>طِينِ‌ۖ وَأَعْتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2782'>دْ</tajweed>نَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13773'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad zayyannas-samā'ad-dun-yā bimaṣābīḥa wa ja'alnāhā rujūmal lisy-syayāṭīni wa a'tadnā lahum 'ażābas-sa'īr(i).
verses.translation: Мы небеса ближайшие украсили светильниками (звезд), И Мы их сотворили для того, чтоб дьяволов изгнать, И уготовили для них Мы наказанье - Гореть в пылающем Огне

verses.text_uthmani: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ‌ۖ وَبِئْسَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':665'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lil-lażīna kafarū birabbihim 'ażābu jahannam(a), wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
verses.translation: Для тех, кто не уверовал в Аллаха, - муки Ада, - Поистине, отвратная обитель (для неверных)

verses.text_uthmani: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُلْقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِيهَا سَمِعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَهَا شَهِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13774'>قًا و</tajweed>َهِىَ تَف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iżā ulqū fīhā sami'ū lahā syahīqaw wa hiya tafūr(u).
verses.translation: Когда в него их будут низвергать, Они услышат рев (зловещий), И возгорится с новой силой пламя

verses.text_uthmani: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2195'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْظِ‌ۖ كُلَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13775'>جٌ س</tajweed>َأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Takādu tamayyazu minal-gaiẓ(i), kullamā ulqiya fīhā faujun sa'alahum khazanatuhā alam ya'tikum nażīr(un).
verses.translation: От гнева чуть не задыхаясь. И всякий раз, когда толпа неверных будет низвергнута туда, Воскликнут стражи (Ада): "Неужто не пришел к вам увещатель

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بَلَىٰ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَنَا نَذِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13776'>رٌ ف</tajweed>َكَذَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13777'>بْ</tajweed>نَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4797'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2103'>ن ش</tajweed>َىْءٍ إِنْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13778'>لٍ ك</tajweed>َب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū balā qad jā'anā nażīr(un), fa każżabnā wa qulnā mā nazzalallāhu min syai'(in), in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīr(in).
verses.translation: Они ответят: "Да, к нам увещатель приходил, Но мы его отвергли и сказали: "Аллах не посылает ничего, И вы лишь в заблуждении великом

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَوْ كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11067'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālū lau kunnā nasma'u au na'qilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābis-sa'īr(i).
verses.translation: И говорят они: "О, если б мы прислушались, О, если б поразмыслили получше, Мы б не были сейчас средь обитателей Огня

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>عْتَرَفُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِذَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13779'>نۢب</tajweed>ِهِمْ فَسُحْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13780'>قًا ل</tajweed>ِّأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13781'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa'tarafū biżambihim, fasuḥqal li'aṣḥābis-sa'īr(i).
verses.translation: Тогда они признали все свои грехи, - (Но нет! Раскаяния их Аллах не принял): Прочь, обитатели зловещего Огня, от милости Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':24'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8779'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبِ لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':3412'>ُم م</tajweed>َّغْفِرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3413'>ةٌ و</tajweed>َأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3414'>جْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6259'>رٌ ك</tajweed>َب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna yakhsyauna rabbahum bil-gaibi lahum magfiratuw wa ajrun kabīr(un).
verses.translation: Но тех, кто глубиной души Его страшится, Прощенье ждет и высшая награда

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَسِرُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13782'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13783'>جْ</tajweed>هَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> عَلِي<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':2196'>مُۢ ب</tajweed>ِذَاتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2197'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa asirrū qaulakum awijharū bih(ī), innahū 'alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
verses.translation: Сокроешь ты свои слова иль молвишь, Секреты всех сердец Он знает

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4309'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>لَّطِيفُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4310'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alā ya'lamu man khalaq(a), wa huwal-laṭīful-khabīr(u).
verses.translation: Как может Он не знать того, что Сам же сотворил? Он - Тот, Кто в корень зрит мельчайших таинств, Владеет знанием всего

verses.text_uthmani: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':153'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':87'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ ذَلُول<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13784'>اً ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13785'>ٱ</tajweed>مْشُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13786'>ِن ر</tajweed>ِّزْقِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13787'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُش<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Huwal-lażī ja'ala lakumul-arḍa żalūlan famsyū fī manākibihā wa kulū mir rizqih(ī), wa ilaihin-nusyūr(u).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто сделал землю вам послушной, - Ходите ж по ее раменам, Кормитесь тем, что вам дарует Бог, - К Нему лежит (и ваше) Воскресение (на Суд)

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ءَأَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13788'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13789'>ُم م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2074'>ن ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':746'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7417'>َن ي</tajweed>َخْسِفَ بِكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13790'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: A'amintum man fis-samā'i ay yakhsifa bikumul-arḍa  fa'iżā hiya tamūr(u).
verses.translation: И есть ли уверенье в вас, Что Тот, Кто сущ на небесах, Под вашими стопами не разверзнет землю, Что поглотит вас? Так ведь она колеблется уже

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ أَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1062'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13791'>ُم م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2074'>ن ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':746'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':10505'>َن ي</tajweed>ُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13792'>بًا‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am amintum man fis-samā'i ay yursila 'alaikum ḥāṣibā(n), fa sata'lamūna kaifa nażīr(i).
verses.translation: И есть ли уверенье в вас, Что Тот, Кто сущ на небесах, На вас не спустит ураган? И вы узнаете тогда, Каким является Мое предупрежденье

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> كَذَّبَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4507'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':617'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':618'>بْ</tajweed>لِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad każżabal-lażīna min qablihim fakaifa kāna nakīr(i).
verses.translation: Поистине, и те, кто был до них, отвергли (веру), И вот тогда - как страшен был Мой гнев

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7520'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>فَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13793'>تٍ و</tajweed>َيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13794'>قْ</tajweed>بِضْنَ‌ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13795'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِكُلِّ شَىْ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13796'>ءِۭ ب</tajweed>َص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Awalam yarau ilaṭ-ṭairi fauqahum ṣāffātiw wa yaqbiḍn(a), mā yumsikuhunna illar-raḥmān(u), innahū bikulli syai'im baṣīr(un).
verses.translation: Ужель они не видят птиц, (которые парят над ними), То крылья распахнув, то вновь сворачивая их? Кто, кроме Милосердного Аллаха, Их удержать способен так? Поистине, всевидящ Он

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َنْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':126'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى هُوَ جُن<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13797'>دٌ ل</tajweed>َّكُمْ يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2381'>نص</tajweed>ُرُك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':2382'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12269'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِ‌ۚ إِنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13798'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am man hāżal-lażī huwa jundul lakum yanṣurukum min dūnir-raḥmān(i), inil-kāfirūna illā fī gurūr(in).
verses.translation: И кто же тот, кто служит ратью вам И кто способен оказать вам помощь, Помимо Милосердного Аллаха? Поистине, неверные - в глубоком заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َنْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':126'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۚ بَل لَّجُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى عُتُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13799'>وٍّ و</tajweed>َنُف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am man hāżal-lażī yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah(ū), bal lajjū fī 'utuwwiw wa nufūr(in).
verses.translation: И кто же тот, кто пропитает вас, Если Аллах от вас удержит пищу? Поистине, погрязли в нечестивости они, (Упрямо) отвергая веру

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13800'>َن ي</tajweed>َمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6818'>جْ</tajweed>هِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَهْدَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13801'>َن ي</tajweed>َمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':726'>طٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Afamay yamsyī mukibban 'alā wajhihī ahdā ammay yamsyī sawiyyan 'alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
verses.translation: Кто ж лучший проводник - Кто, пресмыкаясь, бьет челом о землю Иль тот, кто шествует по праведной стезе

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':153'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4272'>نش</tajweed>َأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7518'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمْعَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6037'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6037'>بْ</tajweed>صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7519'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَفْــِٔدَةَ‌ۖ قَلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4583'>اً م</tajweed>َّا تَشْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul huwal-lażī ansya'akum wa ja'ala lakumus-sam'a wal-abṣāra wal-af'idah(ta), qalīlam mā tasykurūn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Он - Тот, Кто вас взрастил И даровал вам слух, и зрение, и сердце, (Чтоб вы могли и чувствовать, и разуметь), - И все ж как мало благодарны вы

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':153'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul huwal-lażī żara'akum fil-arḍi wa ilaihi tuḥsyarūn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Он - Тот, Кто вас рассеял по земле С тем, чтоб в конце пути земного Созвать вас снова у Себя

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6081'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَعْدُ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa'du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
verses.translation: И говорят они: "Коль истину несете вы, Когда ж исполнятся все ваши обещанья

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12490'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِلْمُ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':408'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَنَا۟ نَذِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':5164'>رٌ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul innamal-'ilmu 'indallāh(i), wa innamā ana nażīrum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: Ты им ответь: "Сие известно только Богу, - Всего лишь увещатель я, Несущий вам открытое и ясное предупрежденье

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13802'>ةً س</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>يٓ</tajweed>ــَٔتْ وُجُوهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13803'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَقِيلَ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':126'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6084'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> تَدَّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā ra'auhu zulfatan sī'at wujūhul-lażīna kafarū wa qīla hāżal-lażī kuntum bihī tadda'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж они узрят его так близко, Покроются их лица мраком, И прозвучит им: "Это - то, к чему вы так взывали

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13804'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9807'>َن م</tajweed>َّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13805'>َن ي</tajweed>ُجِيرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13806'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul ara'aitum in ahlakaniyallāhu wa mam ma'iya au raḥimanā, famay yujīrul-kāfirīna min 'ażābin alīm(in).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Вы видите - была б Господня воля Убить меня и тех, кто следует за мной, Иль милостью Своею всех нас одарить, То кто ж неверных защитит от наказания Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':829'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ ءَامَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا‌ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2393'>لٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul huwar-raḥmānu āmannā bihī wa 'alaihi tawakkalnā, fasata'lamūna man huwa fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Он - Милосердный (Бог). В Него уверовали мы И возложили на Него свои надежды. И в скором времени познаете и вы, Которые из нас в глубоком заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُكُمْ غَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13807'>رًا ف</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13808'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتِيك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13809'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13810'>ءٍ م</tajweed>َّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِۭ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul ara'aitum in aṣbaḥa mā'ukum gauran famay ya'tīkum bimā'im ma'īn(in).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Вы видите - коль утренней зарею Уйдут от вас под землю питьевые воды, Кто повелит прозрачному ключу пролиться к вам
